extendedInfo.description: Ever get in an argument and get stuck with no comeback? Well suffer no more, install Insultimator and have hundreds of new curse words at your fingertips. Insultimator takes 2 words, the first being a curse word and the second being a funny noun or action and combines them to give the user a new curse word to use in any situation. Just open Insultimator and keep pressing the "NEW WORD" button to produce new and hilarious curse words. Insultimator is always a great laugh and is sure to win you that argument or at the least get you an awesome laugh.
